env HAPM_GITHUB_API_BASE_URL=file://$WORK/fake/api
env HAPM_GITHUB_WEB_BASE_URL=file://$WORK/fake/web

exec hapm --manifest hapm.yaml --storage .hapm --dry sync
stdout '\* bar'

exec hapm --storage .hapm updates
stdout 'foo/bar'
stdout 'v1.1.0'

exec hapm --storage .hapm versions foo/bar
stdout 'foo/bar@'
stdout 'v1.0.0'

! exec hapm --storage .hapm versions bad
stdout 'Wrong location format:'

-- hapm.yaml --
integrations:
  - foo/bar@v1.1.0
-- .hapm/_lock.json --
[{"full_name":"foo/bar","kind":"integrations","version":"v1.0.0"}]
